FUN-0001.name: User Registration
FUN-0001.description: The system shall allow new users to register by providing necessary information such as username, password, and email address.

FUN-0002.name: Password Recovery
FUN-0002.description: The system shall provide a password recovery option for users who have forgotten their passwords.

Closure Details.Closure Comments: Development is ongoing, expected to complete by end of month.

FUN-0003.name: User Profile Management
FUN-0003.description: The system shall allow users to view and edit their profile information, including name, email, and profile picture.

Closure Details.Closure Comments: Requirement is planned for future development.

FUN-0004.name: Two-Factor Authentication
FUN-0004.description: The system shall support two-factor authentication to enhance security during user login.

Closure Details.Closure Comments: Requirement is under review for implementation.
Re-evaluating the approach for two-factor authentication.
